thread.title: 2016 Enshrinement Packages on Sale as Hall & QuintEvents Extend Partnership
thread.title_full: 2016 Enshrinement Packages on Sale as Hall & QuintEvents Extend Partnership - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: 2016 Enshrinement Packages on Sale as Hall & QuintEvents Extend Partnership
text:
QuintEvents
Expanded Partnership Brings Fans Closer To Gold Jackets At Other Events
CANTON, Ohio , Aug. 31, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- The Pro Football Hall of Fame has extended its partnership with QuintEvents as the Hall of Fame's Official Event Experience Provider. As part of the agreement, the two entities have created a new collaborative program called Pro Football Hall of Fame Experiences . The program includes the Enshrinement Weekend celebration along with numerous other opportunities for fans to connect with Gold Jackets (living Hall of Famers) at a number of Official Event Experiences around the world. Full details are found on the expanded website, HOFExperiences.com .
Official Ticket Packages for the 2016 Enshrinement Weekend are on sale now . The list of Modern-Era nominees for the Class of 2016 is expected to include first-year eligible players such as Brett Favre and Terrell Owens . Recently, Ken Stabler and Dick Stanfel were named as finalists in the seniors category.
The 2016 event will offer a three- or four-day VIP access throughout Enshrinement Weekend in Canton . Also, back by popular demand, will be the 12 scheduled VIP events such as the Enshrinees' Gold Jacket Ceremony, GameDay Roundtable, Class of 2016 Autograph Session and early viewing of the Class of 2016 bronzed busts shortly after they have been placed permanently on display in the Hall of Fame Gallery.
"The Pro Football Hall of Fame is looking forward to this new program to give fans and groups the ultimate access to Gold Jackets like never before," the Hall of Fame's Senior Director of Sales and Business Development Brock Richards stated. "The Hall of Fame's partnership with QuintEvents has given fans the ultimate experience during Enshrinement Weekend and now that same caliber of experience will be offered throughout the year at additional events."
The Official partnership between the Hall and QuintEvents began in 2013 and provided fans with an elevated experience at the Pro Football Hall of Fame Enshrinement Weekend. The guaranteed authenticity of tickets, and exclusive benefits like meeting the Enshrinees, guaranteed premium seating and all-inclusive VIP hospitality parties with football's greats proved to answer demand.
"We are beyond thrilled about our extended partnership with the Pro Football Hall of Fame," QuintEvents CEO Brian Learst commented. "The success of the Official program over the past three years has exceeded all expectations and we cannot wait to offer our clients additional access to football's greatest players in the upcoming years."
ABOUT PRO FOOTBALL HALL OF FAME
Located in Canton, Ohio , the birthplace of the National Football League, the Pro Football Hall of Fame's Mission is to Honor the Heroes of the Game, Preserve its History, Promote its Values, & Celebrate Excellence EVERYWHERE. For more information, please visit ProFootballHOF.com ; @ProFootballHOF on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube.
ABOUT QUINTEVENTS
QuintEvents is proud to be the Event Experience Provider for the Pro Football Hall of Fame for the Pro Football Hall of Fame Enshrinement Festival, an Official NFL On Location Event Experience Provider, for events including the Super Bowl, Pro Bowl, Draft and International, the Official Experience Package Provider to Churchill Downs® for the Kentucky Derby® and the Kentucky Oaks®, Official Hospitality Provider to the NBA for the NBA All-Star Game and Draft, the Exclusive Official Ticket, Hospitality and Travel Package Provider to Circuit of The Americas™ for the FORMULA 1 UNITED STATES GRAND PRIX™, United SportsCar Racing Series, and MotoGP™ racing series, a Formula One Paddock Club™ Authorized Distributor for the FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP™, an Authorized Agency of MotoGP VIP Village™ for 18 races around the world, the Exclusive Official Ticket, Hospitality and Travel Package Provider to the Breeders' Cup®, the Exclusive Official Ticket, Hospitality and Travel Package Provider to the UFC® for UFC VIP Experience events, an Official Event Experience Provider for College Football Playoff Premium for the College Football National Championship Game, the Official VIP Ticket, Hospitality and Travel Package Provider to Barrett-Jackson for the Scottsdale and Las Vegas Collector Car Auctions, and the Official Global Hospitality Package Provider for the FORMULA 1 GRAN PREMIO DE MÉXICO 2015™.
